column1: good length ball on off stump, defended back to Worrall.
good length ball but this time tailing into the legs, tapped into the leg side to get off the mark.
back of a length on middle stump, goes back to flick but straight to midwicket.
fullish length on sixth stump and swinging well away, dangles the bat well away from the body but can't reach.
fullish length on fourth stump swinging away a touch, walks down the track and whips him high over midwicket, two bounces before rolling over the rope.
good length ball on fifth stump, defended to backward point.
short on the legs, swivels to clock a pull crisply behind square to beat deep backward square with ease.
overpitched on the legs, driven firmly wide of mid-on to get off strike.

length ball on sixth stump, tries to pull this through the leg side but instead skies this a mile high towards deep midwicket. Stoinis runs in 15 yards from the rope moving to his left and takes this confidently with fingers pointed up and palms out while tumbling left. 8/10 on difficulty due to the height and swirl but he was very composed in holding on.
back of a length on the stumps, Inglis rocks back to pull this high and deep over square leg, just clears the man on the rope by about 8 meters.
back of a length on middle stump, goes back to tuck this through square leg and they scamper a sharp two.
full length on fourth stump, driven to extra cover.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended to backward point.
good length ball on off, tip and run into the covers for a sharp single.
good length but width outside off, leans back to drive square behind point piercing the gap beautifully.
good length but straying on the legs, clipped wide of midwicket and they come back for an easy two.
back of a length on fourth stump, defended off the back foot to backward point.
attempted yorker is a low full toss at shin height on middle stump, whipped away with disdain through midwicket and it races to the rope.
good length ball on middle, short arm jab pull behind square and they come back for a tight two.
fullish length ball on off stump, goes back to guide this with soft hands wide of slip.
hello! walks across his stumps to flick/scoop this full length ball from fourth stump at 149 kph over fine leg and it clangs into the ad boards over the rope.
full again and pushes a gentle drive this into the off side to get off strike.
bouncer sails way over Green, keeper Gotch leaps spectacularly with his left-hand to save it from being five wides.

gone! Tremendous athletic effort from the Pakistani quick! Green tried to tip and run into the off side. Haris scoops off his own bowling chasing into short cover, spins, turns and fires at the non-striker's end to nail the top of the stumps with Green three inches short.
back of a length on the legs, swivels to pull behind square and hammers this along the ground but straight to backward square leg.
good length ball on the legs, goes back to tap this gently into midwicket.
good length ball on off, goes back to flick through midwicket.
short on the legs, goes back to whack this through midwicket, misfield in the deep ensures the second.
good length ball slanted across on fifth stump, goes back to cut, very thick edge goes fine of short third man and races away.
fuller and flatter into the legs, pushes this back to Maxwell.

uses his feet but beaten by a quicker and flatter ball again with the length dragged back a fraction on middle stump, tries to drive straight over Maxwell but goes off the splice fluttering to mid-off where Larkin takes a simple catch at waist height shuffling in from the ring.
short on the legs, Marsh hustled trying to pull, goes off the thigh guard and trickles just past leg stump.
back of a length on fifth stump, goes back to punch through cover, chased down just inside the rope and relayed back but they take three.
full but angled down leg, bonus ball coming.
good length on fifth stump, goes back but punches straight to backward point.
good length ball on off stump, goes back to defend into midwicket, Lamichhane.
good length ball again on fifth stump, goes back to punch through cover, inside edge into the feet.
very full on fifth stump at 140 kph, driven tentatively to cover.
good length ball on the stumps, goes back to flick behind square.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back again to push into short midwicket.
good length ball on off stump, goes back to punch to extra cover.
googly spins in from fourth stump on a good length, punched to long-on off the back foot.
googly again bowled flatter and quicker at 90 kph, reverse swept to backward point.
stock leggie at 86 kph on fourth stump, defended back to Lamichhane.
full and wide, flat-footed drive attempt but out of reach, outside the guidelines too so will have to be rebowled.
overpitched on middle and leg, flicked behind square to deep backward square.
full on the legs, clipped behind square for another run.

full and wide to encourage the drive, can't control it though as it flies off the edge toward Worrall at backward point. Wasn't coming at a very fast pace and leaped up with two hands over his head to take the catch. Probably made it more theatrical than it needed to be. 7/10 on difficulty due to the lack of pace coming off the bat. It was dipping by the time it reached him on the edge of the ring.
full and pushed wide of mid-off to get off strike.
good length ball defended into the leg side.
good length ball on the legs, pushed into the leg side.
full and wide, driven firmly to extra cover.
good length ball on middle, defended.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back to punch and beaten.
good length on the stumps, pushed into the leg side.

dropped! Stoinis at deep cover. Flighted full outside off to encourage the drive, not in control of it though and skies this as Stoinis runs in 20 yards but it was dipping late, reaches forward on his knees to get his hands underneath it at ankle height but can't hold on. 8/10 on difficulty due to the low angle it was coming at him, might have been better had he put in a dive. This one was tougher than the skier he claimed earlier.
tapped through the ring to keep strike.
angled across a good length on fourth stump, not much footwork trying to cut through point and cramped for room on the shot, thick edge through to Gotch behind the stumps.
good length ball on off, tapped into point, Bancroft wanted a run and set off from the non-striker's end but was sent back.
good length but angled way outside off, can't reach this and leaves alone, called a wide.
attempted yorker on middle and leg, big inside edge trying to whip this through leg, the ball ricochets off the pads into point.
slower attempted yorker on the legs at 102 kph winds up a shin high full toss, flicked behind square.
yorker speared down leg. Redo coming.
yorkers through this over, finally gets the radar right on the stumps. Morgan tried to drive this through mid-on instead of focusing on keeping it out and pays the price.
fullish length on fifth stump goes back and guides this with soft hands to deep third man.
full on off stump, driven softly in front of point.
good length ball on the stumps, goes back to tap into midwicket.
short of a length on the stumps, extra bounce too pings Jordan on the gloves going back.
full on fourth stump, driven to the sweeper.
good length ball on off, goes back to clip through midwicket.
bouncer clears Jordan ducking out of the way.
slower ball lands full on the legs at 101 kph, clipped through square leg.
full on the stumps, driven through point.
good length but width on offer, sliced straight to point.

full on the stumps, clipped through midwicket. They try to come back for a non-existent second. Sharp relay to Gotch over the striker's stumps on the fly rather than the one-bounce style that's in vogue, gets him a full yard short.
full on off, tip and run into the leg side.
full and wide, tries to squirt this out with a drive but out of reach, rebowl to come.
full on off, tuck and run wide of midwicket.
full and wide, slashes a drive to backward point.
good length ball, prods at this on fourth stump and beaten.

lusty slog from Jordan after looking uncomfortable the previous two balls. Ball pitched on a fullish length but he had to reach out a long way to heave this straight for long-on, too far underneath it to get the distance and taken at long-on 10 yards in from the rope.
on a hat-trick! Googly spins back in from a good length on fourth stump, pokes forward and bowled through the gate.
not the best hat-trick ball. Bowled on a good length but way too far outside off. Easily left alone.
good length ball on fifth stump, poked out to backward point.
full and wide, driven square behind point.
good length ball on the stumps, defended.
short on the body, backs away to fight this off, winds up top edging this over third man and goes all the way.
full on the legs, backs away and slaps to mid-on.
knee high full toss on the stumps, Fawad backs away to create room through the off side and misses. Bowled halfway up the stumps. Poor ball but too much heat on it for a tailender.
full on fourth stump and swinging away, drives at it and is beaten.
good length ball holds its line from fourth stump, beaten defending this time.
good length ball on off, defended to cover.
good length ball on the stumps, defended to mid-on.
good length on the stumps, pushed gently wide of mid-on.
good length ball jags in from off stump, goes back to defend and ball caroms to backward point.
full on off, driven hard through extra cover and races away.
good length swinging in on fourth stump, goes back and pushes softly wide of mid-off.
full and swinging down leg, can't flick this away off the pads. Stifled shouts for lbw.
good length ball defended on middle stump with a touch of swing.
good length ball on off, defended on the back foot to extra cover, misfield allows a run.
full on fourth stump, driven wide enough of mid-off to allow a run.
good length ball on the hips, goes back to clip through square leg.
good length ball on the stumps, defended back to Richardson.
full on the legs, goes across his stumps to flick over fine leg and misses. Wide not called.
good length on sixth stump, wafts away from his body and chops an inside edge through the leg side.
fullish length on fourth stump, backs away to drive over cover and beaten.
back of a length on off stump, defended back to Richardson.
full and swinging down leg at 128 kph, misses a flick but goes off the pads past the keeper for four extras.
short on the legs, pulls this wide of mid-on but chased down well short of the rope.
length ball on fourth stump, plops the front foot down the pitch and creams a lofted drive over mid-off.
overpitched on middle stump, clears the front leg to the leg side and thwacks this high over midwicket in the gap with mid-on before it races away.
full on off, driven to mid-off.
short on the stumps, pulled fiercely behind square, one bounce over the rope.
good length ball on middle, goes back to prod this down the pitch, cut off by mid-on.
fullish length on fifth stump, prodded on the back foot into the covers.
full on off, pushed to cover again.
good length ball on off stump, goes back to flick through square leg.
back of a length on off stump defended to point.
good length ball on off stump, goes back to defend.
short and wide, carves a cut high over point. Poor ball, sums up Scorchers entire night.
slower ball short on the stumps, short arm jab pull along the ground to deep backward square.
fullish length on fourth stump, drives hard, thick edge flies past the keeper and goes fine of deep third man.
length ball on the stumps, swivels to pull and a big noise as it passes Cartwright, big appeal given but not out. Looks like it came off the thigh guard on replay.
full and wide, goes hard driving but beaten for pace.
full on fourth stump, drives hard into the ground to backward point.
good length ball on leg stump, goes back to flick behind square.
full on off, mistimed drive goes off the inside edge to midwicket.

dropped! Another microcosm of the night for Scorchers. Full length ball on fifth stump, drives firmly in the air but not too hard to extra cover, fielder leaps up but parries it over his head. 8/10 on difficulty because it was short range, but basically straight to him. Should've been taken.
good length ball defended.
good length ball pushed down the ground.
uses his feet to charge a full ball and drives to long-on.
full and angled into the legs, can't whip this away.
short on the body, swivels to pull hard behind square, gets it well wide of the deep backward square fielder, one bounce over the rope.
full on off, driven firmly to short extra cover, stopped by Bancroft.

back of a length on fifth stump, goes to pull again but skies this over the pitch. Marsh settles under it at short mid-on just adjacent to the pitch, takes it easily with fingers pointed to the sky, palms out.
full and wide, drives hard and beaten.
short on the stumps, tries to pull but mistimes it into the ground.
flighted full on the legs, pushed wide of Fawad into the off side.

edge! Flies just wide of slip! Good length ball on off stump, goes back to cut, slip fielder was late reacting but the ball went too wide to his left, not sure he would have got a hand to it even if he did have a good reaction.
another back foot punch off a thick edge, this time much wider of slip and goes fine of backward point to the rope.
punched to extra cover, diving stop.
short of a length again on fourth stump, goes for another back foot punch, this time the thinnest edge of the over bobbled by Inglis as it clangs off his chest before settling back into his gloves.
full on the stumps, defended back down the pitch.
good length ball on the stumps, tucked into the leg side off the back foot.
short of a length on fifth stump, runs it off the open face to third man.
short on the stumps, pulled gently along the ground to deep midwicket.
yorker on fourth stump, jammed out to the cover sweeper.
good length ball on off stump, pushed into the off side in front of point.
full on off stump, pushed with soft hands in front of point.
good length ball on off, guided into the ground to slip.
uses his feet to drive a full ball from Fawad high and deep over long-on.
slowed up a touch and shorter on off stump, goes back to chop to cover.
googly short on fourth stump spinning into middle, goes back to cut to point, misfield by David allows the run.
fullish length on fourth stump, shovels this high over extra cover, beats long-off running across to the rope. Looked awkward but placed well by Stoinis.
good length ball on middle, prodded off a thick edge to short third man.
full on the stumps, punched out to backward point.
short on the stumps, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket.
full on the legs, chipped in the air through midwicket, great effort by Morgan to slide and knock back to save a boundary but it's still good enough for three.
short on the body, pulls awkwardly with a short arm jab in the air but well short of deep backward square.
full on off, prodded off the back foot through point.
full on the stumps, walks all the way across to flick this behind square, Morgan slides to cut this off but it goes through him to turn one into a boundary.
full and swinging down leg, misses the flick but the keeper can't save this and it goes for five wides to end the match.
